./.title: Introduction
./.body: Introduction # 记录一些日常使用或是流利说学习的英语。 Copyright © 2015-present airdb.            LastUpdated: 2020-01-11 13:12:49

wiki/dialogue/.title: Dialogue
wiki/dialogue/.body: Title Scene: 怎么用英语谈论擅长的事情？ Target: 你在听朋友弹吉他，你需要：称赞朋友 Section Y(You) and F(Your Friend) Y: x F: y Copyright © 2015-present airdb.            LastUpdated: 2020-01-11 13:12:49

wiki/dialogue/restaurant.html.title: 种草餐厅
wiki/dialogue/restaurant.html.body: 种草餐厅 Scene：种草餐厅 Target: 给朋友推荐一家餐厅。 Section 你给朋友发了一家餐厅照片 You: Have a look! F: A restaurant? You: It's beatuful, isn't it? F: That's true. You: I'm longing to go there. (我一直很想去那。) F: Why? You: I hear the food there is great. F: What food does it sell? You: It's famous for its pizza. F: Show me some pictures. You: Here, look. F: Wow, the pizza looks yummy. You: So... what do you say? F: We can go this Sunday. You: Greet. Copyright © 2015-present airdb.            LastUpdated: 2020-01-11 13:12:49
